segments.text: I glance outside the window, where everything looks serene and picturesque.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden is perfectly arranged, a world away from the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It almost feels unfair that the woman canâ€™t see the impending disaster behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why is she so focused on those dishes while her children are about to make a mess?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the water pooling, and I wonder how long it will take for the cabinets to start absorbing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching longer, and I can feel my breath hitch in my throat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What will happen when he finally loses his balance?
segments.speaker: PAR
